lead_paragraph: Wuzhen, drawing millions of tourists each year, has become a wildly successful example of importing arts and theater into selfie-ready backdrops of flowing canals and stone bridges.

byline.contributor: Pan Jialiang contributed research from Beijing.

headline.print_headline: Ancient Town Finds Profitable Cultural Rebirth
headline.main: Ancient Town in China Enjoys Profitable Rebirth as a ‘Beautiful Stage’

snippet: Wuzhen, drawing millions of tourists each year, has become a wildly successful example of importing arts and theater into selfie-ready backdrops of flowing canals and stone bridges....
abstract: Wuzhen Journal; town of Wuzhen in China has become model for tourist development in country, attracting nearly seven million tourists each year; local officials are looking to build on that success by injecting culture into area.
